title: Los Troncos
summary: An AWS hosted Blockchain solution to control illegal wood trafficking in Colombia. It allows wood choppers to register pieces of wood in a Blockchain via SMS, and police officers to verify them using a mobile app and a QR code. As well, it has a visualizer where users could trace the origin of their final wood products.

title: Senecare Backend
summary: Senecare is a mobile out that helps to mitigate the spread of COVID-19 in Uniandes. By filling a daily test designed by the medical staff, it is determined whether the person can enter the campus. It also collects data related to the disease and vaccinatios for a visualizer designed for the medical staff.

title: Cooking Martha
summary: A personal assistant that helps people through the process of cooking. Martha can recommend you recipes based on your ingredients, guide you through a recipe, and answer you any question related to cooking

title: QPark
summary: A mobile app that helps people to park their vehicle in crowded areas. Simply schedule a pickup point using the mobile app, and one of our valets will be waiting for you.
